column4: Hi guys, I'm trying to add an undetected resolution following this support article: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Config/Resolution However I'm stuck on 'You may create a modeline using the gtf or cvt utility.' how do i do this?
what do I do with that?
I've got my modeline now. Should I put this in my xorg.conf or follow the guide and create a 'newmode'
I would do that the guide says
i tried that and all i get in terminal is a help file on xrandr with all of its options. it doesn't seem to work.
so where are you stuck now?
err no .. that line that gtf generated was supposed to be put into the xorg.conf file
are you sure you are following the guide properly? :)
oh... ? I think i'm reading it correctly; under adding undetected resolutions: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Config/Resolution I am a total noob to linux/ubuntu though.
oh, i see .. well, something like this then.  xrandr --newmode "1024x768" 63.50  1024 1072 1176 1328   768  771  775 798 -hsync +vsync
okay mate i'll give it a crack. thank you.
